page.title: 10FISHERMAN INTERVIEW
page.content: Brian has a grey moustache and black-grey hair.He is middle aged and has dark skin.His forehead is wrinkled Brian has a big build and is tall.He comes from Bristol and has a Bristol accent.We interviewed him at his home.It was quite dark inside his house but it was cosy.Charlotte and I sat on the floor and Brian sat on a stool.Brian is talking about fishing around the coast from Dartmouth to Redlap. "I have my own Charter Vessel I take anglers out. They come from all over the country,that's how I make my living.I have a Mitchelle 31,it's licensed for 10 anglers.It's fully equipped with radar,radio,VHF,echo- sounder and fish-finder.That's a lot of expensive equipment,but you've got to to give the best day's fishing,also for safety and my license."
